.. _`projects_admin_document_templates`:

Document Templates
##################

Documents or document templates can be used as templates in projects.
For more information on this topic, please refer to the section :ref:`pcs_user_en:cdbwinusrman-pcs-doctemplates` of the
user manual. The system uses :ref:`ce_admin_en:cdbpws-api-cdbobjects-rules` to ensure that only valid documents as
templates can be used.

.. index:: Configurable Rules;cdbpcs: Index-dependent Valid Documents for Instantiation

.. _`configurable_rule_index_dependent_valid_documents_for_instantiation`:

Always use the assigned index as a document template
====================================================

If the option :guilabel:`Allways use this index` is activated on the assignment of document and business object,
you can define the valid document using the configurable rule
:guilabel:`cdbpcs: Index-dependent Valid Documents for Instantiation`.

.. index:: Configurable Rules;cdbpcs: Documents valid for Instantiation

.. _`configurable_rule_documents_valid_for_instantiation`:

Use the currently valid index as a document template
====================================================

If the option :guilabel:`Always Use this Index` is not activated on the assignment of document and business object,
you can define the valid document using the configurable rule
:guilabel:`cdbpcs: Documents valid for Instantiation`.
